mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jm_bt_master_info ( channel_id, image_key_1, image_key_2, image_key_3, data_type, image_index, value1, value2, syn_flg, error_message, created, creater, modified, modifier ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{imageKey1}, #{imageKey2}, #{imageKey3}, #{dataType}, #{imageIndex}, #{value1}, #{value2}, #{synFlg}, #{errorMessage}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
